Constructor Detail

ScheduleUtilities

public ScheduleUtilities()
Method Detail

simplifySchedule

public static Schedule simplifySchedule(Schedule s)
Simplify a Quantity schedule by producing the smallest schedule which has the same quantity-value curve. That is, no temporally-overlapping elements and no abutting elements with the same value.

computeNonOverlappingSchedule

public static Schedule computeNonOverlappingSchedule(Schedule aSchedule)
Return non-overlapping schedules from thescheduleelements. Assumes that all schedule elements are ScheduleElementWithValue Sums all ScheduleElementWithValue on a per day basis.

Parameters:
aSchedule -
Returns:
Schedule A new Schedule object with non-overlapping (time) ScheduleElementWithValue
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
See Also:
Schedule, ScheduleElementWithValue

combineLikeQuantityElements

public static Schedule combineLikeQuantityElements(Schedule aSchedule)
Returns a schedule that creates ScheduleElementWithValue that span multiple days if there are Like ScheduleElementWithValues during that time period. This is more efficient than having a scheduleelement for each day. This method expects a Schedule containing ONLY ScheduleElementWithValues

Parameters:
aSchedule -
Returns:
Schedule
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
See Also:
Schedule, ScheduleElementWithValue

sumElements

public static double sumElements(java.util.Collection aSet)
Add the quantities of the scheduleelements in the set. Must be a set of ScheduleElementWithValues or RateScheduleElement

Parameters:
aSet - Called with all the schedule elements for a day.
Returns:
double
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
